job.name: File Trigger
job.description: Process a file whenever the file is created in a specified folder. For the sake of this example, the monitoring loop will stop after 5 times (see loop code).

task.name: FileTrigger
task.description: This groovy task check if new files are created in a specified folder (FOLDER_TO_MONITOR). If that is the case, it will pass the file name to the Process Task

task.name: Process
task.description: This task will be replicated according to the 'runs' value specified in the replication script. The replication index is used in each task's instance to select the input.

task.name: Merge
task.description: As a merge operation, we simply print the results from previous tasks.
